Titles.eng: Marmalade Boy
Titles.jpn: ママレード・ボーイ

Summaries.eng: Miki Koishikawa lived a normal life - until her parents tell her they'll get divorced.. She doesn't agree, until she meets Yuu Matsuura... the handsome son of another couple, with whom her parents are switching spouses. They all live together now in an enormous house, and Miki and Yuu find themselves falling in love. They'll have to struggle with their own feelings, other people who want to be with them, and whatever Lady Luck and Fate throws in their ways...
Summaries.jpn: 互いの両親の“入れ替わり結婚”のため同居する事になった光希と遊。顔はいいのに、クールで意地悪。でも、たまにやさしい…そんなママレードみたいな遊に光希は次第にひかれて…。

Titles.eng: Marmalade Boy Movie
Titles.jpn: 劇場版ママレード・ボーイ

Summaries.eng: A prelude to Marmalade Boy the TV series. Yuu remembers the day when his parents decided to divorce each other and remarry with another married couple. Toubled by the news, Yuu decides to take a walk, on which he spots a girl he falls in love with at first sight. He decides to follow this unaware girl and falls more in love with her. However he discovers who the girl really is...she's the daughter of his parents' new lovers.

Titles.eng: I Want to Fall in Love – “He’s Handsome, but I Can’t Forgive Him!”
Titles.jpn: 恋がしたい「カッコイイけど許せない！」

Summaries.eng:
The episode begins with Miki saying that her life is too boring and she wishes it would be more exciting. And she kinda got her wish... Her parents were getting divorced. But this was a very strange divorce. They were just gonna switch partners with another family, the Matsuuras.
During their romantic trip to Hawaii, they met the Matsuuras. Miki's dad fell in love with Mrs. Chiyako Matsuura and Miki's mom fell in love with Mr. Youji Matsuura. So they talked about it and decided to switch partners.
Summaries.jpn: 光希の両親が突然離婚し、再婚すると言い出した！　光希は断固阻止しようとするが相手夫婦の息子には…。

Titles.eng: Aftereffects of a Kiss – “I Don’t Know What He’s Thinking.”
Titles.jpn: キス後遺症 「あいつの気持ちがワカラナイ」

Summaries.eng:
Miki is at her crazy house getting ready for school and her parents all left. Only her and Yuu remain in the house. She's been trying to avoid Yuu since ""the kiss."" But she can no longer avoid him and goes into the kitchen (where he is).
This episode is where you get the name of the series 'Marmalade Boy!' Miki compares Yuu to marmalade saying he has bitter bits inside him but everyone sees his sweet looking outside: Marmalade Boy! And Yuu compared Miki to mustard: always sour and spicey, Mustard Girl!
Well, Miki's strange family seems to get along together (though it is rather strange...).

Titles.eng: Two Kisses – “Yuu Had a Girlfriend?”
Titles.jpn: 2つのキス 「遊に恋人がいた!？」

Summaries.eng:
Miki has told Meiko about the photo she discovered, and in her reply, Meiko said, ""If you're so concerned about it, then that means......YOU'RE IN LOVE WITH HIM!""
The next day, Yuu is at the library reading, when a good looking Senior Student comes in and sits next to him; it wasn't long before Yuu realized that the Student was staring at him in an admiring look, Yuu askes him why he was staring at him, the Student replies, ""You're interesting to look at."" Yuu gets a little scared and runs off.
That night, Chiyako gives Yuu and Miki some free tickets to an amusement park called ""Wonder Dog"". Miki was excited, and when Yuu says he'll acompany her, she starts to think this could be a date.

Titles.eng: Ginta’s Confession – “I’m Not Gonna Let Him Take You!”
Titles.jpn: 銀太の告白 「おまえをあいつに渡さない!」

Summaries.eng: Miki swears that she won't forgive Ginta for kissing her since they weren't in love. The next day, she tries to get up late so she won't meet Ginta but Yuu forces her out of bed. When Yuu and Miki arrive at school and met with Ginta and Meiko, Miki just hands Meiko her diary and leaves, Ginta angrily walks the other way. Meiko understood the story from Miki's diary.   After school, Miki makes Meiko take her place as cleanup student and when Ginta calls her, Miki warned him to stay out of her sight before running off.

Titles.eng: Legend of Lovers – “With All My Heart in the Medallion.”
Titles.jpn: 恋人の伝説 「メダイユに想いをこめて」

Summaries.eng: While Ginta is pestering Miki to tell him how she feels they get interrupted by none other than, Yuu. Miki runs in the house and Ginta learns about how Miki and Yuu really know each other. Later the next day Miki tells Ginta that she's really confused right now, and until she sorts out how she feels they should continue being friends. After school that day Meiko and Miki find out where Yuu works and they meet his boss. He tells them his amazingly beautiful story about him and his current wife but doesn't tell them that it's him. The next day Ginta is practicing and find out that his partner for the tournament has broken something and has to take it easy. Yuu is asked by Miki to be Ginta's partner and he accepts it. Yuu agrees and runs to the library and he sees something happen between Shinichi and Meiko. What did he see?

Titles.eng: Love Game – “I Hate You, Ginta!”
Titles.jpn: ラブゲーム 「銀太なんか大嫌い!」

Summaries.eng: Meiko is thinking about tell Miki that Shinichi and She are together but she can’t seem to bring herself to say it. The next day the tournament was stating with the match against Yuu’s old school. This guy there that is related to Ginta and Yuu (in different ways) is their opponent. His name is, Tsutomu Rocktanda, and he is Ginta’s cousin. He knows about Miki’s letter to Ginta and laughs about it. Miki all mad tells Ginta “I hate you” and runs off. This affects Ginta’s game. Does Miki come back to cheer them on, or do they lose the tournament?

Titles.eng: Hokkaido With Love – “What’s Going on With Those Two?”
Titles.jpn: 恋の北海道 「どうなってるの？ あの二人!」

Summaries.eng: Miki's class is going on their trip to Hokkaido. Miki and Meiko are in the same group and Yuu and Ginta are in the same group. Miki's group goes on their tour; they star with the tower in Hokkaido. Miki takes a second to see the gift shop; she turns around and they're gone. She goes and looks for them and finds Yuu and Ginta instead. Then Arimi randomly comes and grabs Ginta's arm. Does this bother Miki?

Titles.eng: The Fragrance of an Adult – “I’m Not Jealous!”
Titles.jpn: 大人の香り 「やきもちなんてやいてない!」

Summaries.eng: It's a new day and Miki's looking at the pictures that she went to hokkaido. She keeps thinking of weather she's jealous or not. She wants to stay in bed and avoid seeing Yuu, Though he won't stop knocking on the door till she gets up. She comes down and there's a BBQ going on in the backyard. It's a family welcome back party for Yuu and, Miki. Miki has realized that she's getting caught up in the atmospere; though she's still doing her best to fight it. Her father suggests they all go out to have some fun together, everyone says yes except one person, Miki. She runs off and goes to a shop where she runs into, Arimi. When she gets home a vase breaks and it looks like they had a fight. What happens to the 6 of them?

Titles.eng: Part-Time Job – “The War of Love Depends on Sales.”
Titles.jpn: アルバイト 「恋の勝負は売り上げ次第!」

Summaries.eng: Miki is still trying to figure out who she likes, Yuu or Ginta. The end of the school day Yuu asks Miki for her help at the shop just for the day. Ginta walks by and sees them talking but is wondering what they're saying. Later that day Ginta and Arimi drop by the shop for their plan. That's when Tsutomu comes in. He challenges both; Ginta and Yuu, with the cost for the loser will shave their head. Who wins and who wins? And what happens when Yuu and Miki get home?

Titles.eng: Our First Night – “Surprise in the Bathroom.”
Titles.jpn: 初めての夜 「お風呂でドキッ♥」

Summaries.eng: Miki and Yuu's parents go for a trip, leaving Miki alone with Yuu. Yuu is talking a bath, while Miki is in her room waiting for the bath and writing to Meiko. Yuu comes in her room telling her that he's done giving her her turn. She takes a nice hot bath and apparently takes too long. She wraps the towel around herself and then faints. Yuu notices and runs down stairs. What does he do?

Titles.eng: Birthday – “Yuu Is Staring at Me!”
Titles.jpn: バースデイ 「遊が私を見つめてる…」

Summaries.eng: The morning after the whole towel fiasco, Miki and Yuu get a call from Yuu's mom, Chiyako, telling Miki to wish Yuu a happy birthday. Miki was so surprised when she found out it was Yuu's birthday. That day she spent her time thinking about what to do for his birthday. She buys food and cake mix for the cake she makes it herself. What will happen between them that day?

Titles.eng: Smash – “I Like Both Yuu and Ginta!”
Titles.jpn: スマッシュ! 「遊と銀太どっちも好き…」

Summaries.eng: Miki starts writing to Meiko telling her that her parents are coming back the next day. When she gets to school she can't look Ginta in the face and then runs away. After Meiko reads the diary she understands. Then Miki's name is being called to the staff room and, she is told that she will representing the school in the next tennis tournament and she's freaking out about it. On her way to practice she sees Ginta and tells him to wait for her answer after the tournament. Yuu recommends going over to Meiko's house for the night to talk to her. The next day her and Ginta partner up to practice for tennis. Miki starts feeling the pressure so Yuu takes her shopping. Miki realizes that Yuu took her shopping to calm her down from the pressure what will happen in the match? What will Miki's answer be?

Titles.eng: Love and Friendship – “Ginta, Please Date Arimi.”
Titles.jpn: 恋と友情 「銀太、亜梨実さんとつきあって!」

Summaries.eng: Miki walks into her room drying her hair and thinking about the day before. The next day she and Ginta go to the roof to talk. She tells him the truth about her feelings and that she likes both Yuu and Ginta. She tells him that he should date Arimi instead. After school that day Miki and Meiko go to the coffee shop and talk. Meiko say something that confuses Miki even more. Later that day she goes shopping and bumps into Arimi on the sidewalk. She makes a little joke that Miki takes seriously. She's on her way home and sees Ginta in front of her house and he confesses everything and the truth behind his relationship between him and Arimi. What else happens between them?

Titles.eng: Qualification of Love – “You Don’t Deserve Yuu!”
Titles.jpn: 恋する資格 「あなたは遊にふさわしくない!」

Summaries.eng: It starts with Meiko writing in the diary. Thinking what she said that day and telling Miki that she thinks it's courageous of her to think of him instead of herself. The next morning Miki's in bed thinking about the almost kiss with; Ginta and then having Yuu break it up. Not knowing how to face them. That day at school during class Meiko starts daydreaming about her last date with Shinichi and what they promised each other. Satoshi goes to the library hoping to find, Meiko. He sees Yuu instead and then saying something that creped him out. Miki, running late for practice sees Arimi on the way and gets and apology for the scheme. Then explaining tings to Miki she runs away. Meiko's parents on the other hand; have another fight. How does this affect Meiko?

Titles.eng: Meiko’s Secret – “I Wish You Had Told Me.”
Titles.jpn: 茗子の秘密 「話してほしかった…」

Summaries.eng: Miki is still thinking about the kiss between, Arimi and Yuu. She calls Meiko's house but she's not there. Ginta tells Miki that he is willing to wait until she is ready to choose him. They start to carry on with the way things were. Then Shinichi is called to the office and, they've learned about Meiko's sleepover with Shinichi. What really happened? What happens to Meiko and Shinichi?

Titles.eng: A Man’s Decision – “Please Don’t Quit, NA-Chan!”
Titles.jpn: 男の決断 「なっちゃん、辞めないで!」

Summaries.eng: With the whole fiasco with Meiko Shinichi decides to quit as a teacher and work as a real estate agent with his parents in Hiroshima. He tells the class this with Meiko absent she has no idea on what is going on with him. When Miki wants to talk to her Meiko says something that upsets Miki a lot. What happens next?

Titles.eng: Meiko’s Seperation – “I Can’t Say Goodbye!”
Titles.jpn: 茗子の別れ 「さよならなんてできない!」

Summaries.eng: Shinichi tells the class that he quits and that he's leaving. Gives Meiko back her pendant. He gives Meiko a call and tells her that he's leaving for Hiroshima. She tells him to take her with him. Meiko goes to Miki's house to apologize for saying what she said. She then leaves. Yuu makes Miki leave for the train station with him and go after Meiko. What happens next?

Titles.eng: The Direction of Love – “You Can’t Have It the Way You Wanted.”
Titles.jpn: 恋のゆくえ 「思い通りにならないね」

Summaries.eng: Miki's sitting in her room trying to write something in the diary to make Meiko feel better. Meiko's at school the next day, and she's acting the way she usually does. In class all her friends are greeting her as if she weren't there for a month. There's a lot of gossip going on, but Miki and the others all stick up their noses at those who like to gossip. Later that day in the library Meiko is crying. Is she really okay with Shinichi's move to, Hiroshima?

Titles.eng: Marriage Feud – “Don’t Say It’s Ridiculous!”
Titles.jpn: 入籍騒動 「非常識なんて言わないで!」

Summaries.eng: Miki's in her room studying for final exams, when she is called for dinner. Since after the exams schools out the family will be going to register their marriages and then going to eat at an Italian restaurant for a celebration dinner. After the registration they were on their way to the restaurant to eat, but suddenly Miki is feeling weird and decides to take a rain check for it. After leaving she keeps thinking about when she was little and what was going on with her parents. She takes a break and sits down. After she sits Yuu decides to say that he's there. Later they go for burgers and, rubs it in Miki's face that he gave up the gourmet meal. After getting home she goes to her room. She replaces the picture in her medallion from her and her parents to Yuu's picture. The next day someone with a camera that goes to Yuu and Miki's school is video taping everyone that come out of the house. He's video taping them for a story. How does this video come out?

Titles.eng: Doubtful Twosome – “Yuu and Miwa-San Are a Couple?!”
Titles.jpn: 怪しい二人 「遊と三輪さんがカップルゥ？!」

Summaries.eng: Miki and her friends are grieving over the fact the the marathon tournament is coming up. Then they heard a rumor that Yuu and Satoshi are a couple at school. So Miki and Meiko go to spy on them. They like a good couple. How does Miki react to this?

Titles.eng: Trip to Karuizawa! – “Just as I Thought... Strange!”
Titles.jpn: 軽井沢旅行 「やっぱり……変!」

Summaries.eng: Miki is getting jealous because everyone at the school is under the impression that Yuu and Satoshi are a couple. Since Summer Vacation Started Yuu has been working all day and comes home really tired. Miki doesn't have a chance to talk to him anymore. When Miki and Meiko are out shopping, Meiko has the idea that they should go to Yuu's store and she should buy that dress that she's been needing. The trip also has the ulterior motive to find out the real relationship between Yuu and Satoshi, who just happens to be at the store. Will Miki Get to the bottom of this rumor that is going around school?

Titles.eng: Double Date – “I Like You, but We Don’t Understand Each Other!”
Titles.jpn: Wデート! 「好きなのにわかりあえない」

Summaries.eng: Meiko goes to the library to get some materials for a manuscript. She keeps remembering Namura Sensei, they aren't sad memories though. Satoshi has the idea that Miki, Yuu, Meiko join him to a movie for a double date. They four of them split up into pairs and Meiko isn't happy about it but she realizes Miki needs time alone with Yuu. After the movie ended, Yuu started running with Miki out of the theater. Satoshi has the idea that if Meiko spends the day with him, he will tell her his relationship with Yuu. The next day Yuu leaves with Satoshi to go somewhere. Miki and Meiko Follow them. What do they discover?

Titles.eng: Shocking Confession – “Yuu, What About You Talking About?”
Titles.jpn: 衝撃の告白 「遊、何を言ってるの？」

Summaries.eng: Meiko is invited to a friends villa, she goes every year. Seeing as Miki is still feeling down about the whole thing with Yuu Meiko invites her. Ginta, Yuu and Satoshi invite themselves along just for the heck of it!

Titles.eng: The Secret of His Birth – “I Can’t Leave Yuu Alone!”
Titles.jpn: 出生の秘密 「遊をほっとけないの!」

Titles.eng: Real Kiss – “Yuu, I Love You!”
Titles.jpn: リアルキス 「あたし、遊が好き!」

Titles.eng: New Anxiety – “I’m Too Afraid to Be Happy.”
Titles.jpn: 新たな不安 「幸せすぎて…怖い」

Titles.eng: Love Worries – “How Long Will This Happiness Last?”
Titles.jpn: 恋の不安 「この幸せはいつまで続くの？」

Titles.eng: Unstable Feelings – “I’m Going to Get a Part-Time Job!”
Titles.jpn: ゆれる心 「あたしもバイトするっ!!」

Titles.eng: Obstacle to Love – “I Can’t Find the Medallion!”
Titles.jpn: 恋の邪魔者 「メダイユがみつからない!」

Titles.eng: Rival – “I Love Yuu!”
Titles.jpn: ライバル 「ゆー、大好きよ」

Titles.eng: Suzu and Kei – “Those Two Make Me Nervous...”
Titles.jpn: すずと蛍 「不安にさせるこの二人…」

Titles.eng: Love at the School Festival – “Yuu and Kei’s Concert”
Titles.jpn: 恋の学園祭 「遊と蛍のコンサート」

Titles.eng: Lost Love – “I Love You”
Titles.jpn: 恋の迷い道 「好きだ!」

Titles.eng: Breakup Premonition – “The Halloween Conspiracy”
Titles.jpn: 別れの予感 「ハロウインパーティーのたくらみ」

Titles.eng: Misunderstanding – “You Mean We’re Going to Break Up?”
Titles.jpn: すれちがい 「別れようってことなの？」

Titles.eng: I’m Alone – “I’ll Make You Forget Him!”
Titles.jpn: 一人ぼっち 「俺が忘れさせてやる!!」

Titles.eng: Tearful Reunion – “I Thought It Was Over Between Us!”
Titles.jpn: 悲しい再会 「吹っきれたと思ってたのに…」

Titles.eng: Anju’s Feelings – “I Don’t Mind Being Second to Miki.”
Titles.jpn: 杏樹の想い 「光希さんの次でいいの!」

Titles.eng: A Bitter Love – “I’ve Loved Yuu for a Long Time.”
Titles.jpn: せつない恋 「ずっと遊が好きだった…」

Titles.eng: A Holy Night – “I’m Alone on Christmas Eve.”
Titles.jpn: 聖なる夜 「イヴなのに一人ぼっち…」

Titles.eng: The Morning of Lovers – “Merry Christmas.”
Titles.jpn: 恋人達の朝 「メリークリスマス」

Titles.eng: New Year’s Love Pattern – “It’s Going to Be a Wonderful Year.”
Titles.jpn: 新春恋模様 「サイコーの年になりそう」

Titles.eng: Ski Trip – “I Won’t Let You Two Be Alone!”
Titles.jpn: スキー旅行 「二人っきりになんかさせない!」

Titles.eng: Our Future – “Yuu’s Dream, My Dream?”
Titles.jpn: 二人の将来 「遊の夢、私の夢は？」

Titles.eng: Meiko’s Turnaround – “I’m Going to Hiroshima.”
Titles.jpn: ゆれる茗子 「私、広島に行く!」

Titles.eng: To Hiroshima – “Let Me Be by Your Side Again!”
Titles.jpn: 広島へ… 「もう一度そばにいさせて!」

Titles.eng: Couple on the Beach – “Because I Care About You.”
Titles.jpn: 海辺の二人 「君の幸せを思うから…」

Titles.eng: A Taste of Chocolate – “Sweet and Bitter Valentine.”
Titles.jpn: チョコの味 「甘くて苦いバレンタイン!」

Titles.eng: The Shape of Love – “It’s Difficult to Be Happy.”
Titles.jpn: 愛のかたち 「幸せになるってムズカシイ」

Titles.eng: The Foreign Exchange Student Arrives – “Michael’s... Strange!”
Titles.jpn: 留学生登場 「マイケルって…変!」

Titles.eng: Love Triangle – “Someone’s Messing Things Up.”
Titles.jpn: 三角関係 「ふりまわされて…」

Titles.eng: Moonlight Decision – “Yuu, Don’t Leave Me Alone!”
Titles.jpn: 月夜の決心 「遊、離れるなんて…イヤ!」

Titles.eng: Making Memories – “No Matter What Happens, I’ll Have No Regrets.”
Titles.jpn: 思い出作り 「何が起こっても後悔しない」

Titles.eng: New Life – “Yuu, How Are You Doing Right Now?”
Titles.jpn: 新生活 「遊、今頃どうしてるかな？」

Titles.eng: Love Trouble – “New York Is Too Far Away!”
Titles.jpn: 波紋・再び 「ニューヨークは遠すぎる!」

Titles.eng: Misunderstandings – “My Boyfriend Is Yuu, But...”
Titles.jpn: すれちがい 「あたしの恋人は遊なのに…」

Titles.eng: Missing Each Other – “I’m So Lonely, I Can’t Take It Anymore.”
Titles.jpn: 恋の迷い道 「もう耐えられない! 寂（さみ）しいの…」

Titles.eng: Love Confession – “I Want You to See Me as a Man!”
Titles.jpn: 告白の音色 「ボクを男として見てほしい!」

Titles.eng: Anxious Weekend – “I Want to Hear Yuu’s Voice.”
Titles.jpn: 不安な週末 「遊の声が聞きたい!」

Titles.eng: My Love Is Far Away – “Yuu Is Right in Front of Me.”
Titles.jpn: 恋人は遠い 「遊はあたしの目の前にいる」

Titles.eng: New York Trap – “Yuu, Was I a Fool?”
Titles.jpn: N.Y（ニューヨーク）の罠 「遊、あたしが馬鹿だったの？」

Titles.eng: Goodbye – “I Can’t Be Your Girlfriend Anymore.”
Titles.jpn: さよなら 「もう…彼女でいられない」

Titles.eng: Holding Back the Tears – “I Want to Be Alone.”
Titles.jpn: 涙を抱いて 「今は一人でいたい」

Titles.eng: A Couple’s Problems – “I Want to Hear Your Voice.”
Titles.jpn: 二人の問題 「おまえの声が聞きたい」

Titles.eng: Firm Decision – “I’m Taking Miki Away From You.”
Titles.jpn: かたい決意 「光希は…おれがもらう」

Titles.eng: New Choice – “You Don’t Have to Forget About Him.”
Titles.jpn: 新たな選択 「あいつを忘れなくてもいい」

Titles.eng: Friends – “I Need Kei!”
Titles.jpn: ともだち 「あたしには蛍クンが必要なの!」

Titles.eng: Indecisive Lovers – “Goodbye, Ginta.”
Titles.jpn: 揺れる恋人 「サヨナラ…銀太」

Titles.eng: The Courage to Love – “I’ve Decided.”
Titles.jpn: 恋の勇気 「決心がついた!」

Titles.eng: I’m Home – “How Will I Be Around Him?”
Titles.jpn: ただいま 「どんな顔して会えばいいの？」

Titles.eng: Night of the Moon and Stars – “I’m Still Lonely... Even When You’re Close.”
Titles.jpn: 星と月の夜 「近くにいても…寂しい」

Titles.eng: Half Brother and Sister – “Our Happiness Is Shattering.”
Titles.jpn: 異母兄妹 「幸せが…こわれていく」

Titles.eng: Farewell – “I Had No Choice.”
Titles.jpn: 別れ 「こうするしかなかった…」

Titles.eng: Box of Memories – “Goodbye, Yuu.”
Titles.jpn: 想い出の箱 「バイバイ、遊」

Titles.eng: Brother and Sister?! – “There’s No Choice but to Break Up.”
Titles.jpn: 兄と妹!？ 「別れるしかないんだ!」

Titles.eng: Departure – “Love Will Go On.”
Titles.jpn: たびだち 「そして、愛は歩きだす」
